DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Other Area Or Volume Measurement Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the area or volume measurement of a lesion that hasn't already been reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._The extent of a 2-dimensional surface enclosed within a boundary._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's tumor.
